CustomField.formula: IF( IsMatchingThresholdEnabled__c, 'Send a notification if there are ' + TEXT(MatchingThresholdRecordCount__c) + ' or more matches within a ' + TEXT(MatchingThresholdTimePeriodIncrement__c) + ' ' + LOWER(TEXT(MatchingThresholdTimePeriodUnit__c)) + ' time period', 'Send a notification for any matches' )
CustomField.label: Matching Threshold Summary
